text: My thoughts today are also with the military families andfriends who have lost a loved one in the line of duty. Our nation is made strongerby their resilience commitment and dedication. (3/3)
On Memorial Day we take this day to reflect on the promises we’ve made to all who have put on the uniform. (2/3)

Today we pay tribute to the brave service members who have made the ultimate sacrifice defending our country. From our nation’s earliest days the best among us have always answered the call to serve. (1/3) http
